title: Your Cat Might Not Be Ignoring You When You Speak
description: Cats have a reputation for being aloof, but a new study has found that their relationships with their owners may be stronger than we thought.
dc:creator: Anthony Ham

media:content.media:description: Cats are often seen as aloof. But in a new study, they were not ignoring their owners, but instead “their reactions were very subtle,” the lead author of the study said.
